headline: Does HPE’s (HPE) AI-Native Retail Network Push Reveal a Deeper Edge Strategy Shift?
summary: Earlier in January, Hewlett Packard Enterprise expanded its retail-ready portfolio and showcased new Nonstop Compute systems and HPE Aruba Networking CX 6000 switches at NRF 2026, aiming to strengthen connectivity, security, and performance from warehouse to curbside. The integration of Mist AIOps, Marvis virtual network assistant, and expanded edge switching highlights HPE’s push to combine AI-native insight with always-on retail operations infrastructure. With shares moving modestly over...
